resources.string:
YOUR DEVICE MAY BE BRICKED so get a flashable zip or something else like that. Mygod Studioâ„¢ will not be responsible for any problem caused by this app. USE IT AT YOUR OWN RISK!

When you\'ve done reading this, swipe to the right to begin your adventure!

Quick Guide: Pick a mode and press that save button and reboot to begin your adventure!

DPI: DPI stands for Dots Per Inch. The smaller DPI is, the smaller the text and icons become and the larger your screen gets. Simple as that.

Device Default: DPI you were using when you first entered this app. Used for restoring!
Small Phone Mode: Now isn\'t your phone small? Actually I would not recommend you to set a DPI higher than this value, unless you would like to get some real fun.
Large Phone Mode: Now you have a large-sized phone! Isn\'t that great?
Small Tablet Mode: Now you have a 7-inch tablet! Some of the tablet features should be unlocked now, and if you happened to be using Android 4.0.3 Ice Cream Sandwich, you\'ve unlocked ALL the tablet features now!
Large Tablet Mode: Now you have a 10-inch tablet! ALL THE TABLET FEATURES IS UNLOCKED in this mode! Isn\'t that great?

And finally, the Customization! With this mode, you can change your DPI to whatever you want. Please note that if you picked a DPI between Small Tablet Mode and Large Tablet Mode, the Small Tablet Mode will be triggered, if you picked a DPI between Phone Modes and Small Tablet Mode, the Phone Modes will be triggered.
An error occurred when trying to check for updates.
